resources.string: Find events here. Press any that you\'re interested in in order to begin the buying process.
How to get to my Tickets
Press this button, and then press \'My Tickets\' in order to see the tickets you\'ve purchased.
Showing your tickets at the door
Tickets will show up here. \n\nOpen a ticket by pressing it, and show this to the bouncer in order to get into the event.
